Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Strainer
Description: Kind of low cup, brown in colour with black patches (fireclouds), whose bottom is pierced with numerous holes approximately 2-3 mm in diametre. In some places, marks from the burnish can be seen. This object was very likely used as a strainer.
